participant_id.Description: Unique BIDS identifier for the participant in this study.

subjectkey.Description: The NDAR Global Unique Identifier (GUID) for research subject

src_subject_id.Description: Subject ID how it's defined in lab/project

interview_date.Description: Date on which the interview/genetic test/sampling/imaging/biospecimen was completed. MM/DD/YYYY

interview_age.Description: Age in months at the time of the interview/test/sampling/imaging. | Age is rounded to chronological month. If the research participant is 15-days-old at time of interview, the appropriate value would be 0 months. If the participant is 16-days-old, the value would be 1 month.

sex.Description: Sex of subject at birth | M = Male; F = Female; O=Other; NR = Not reported

eventname.Description: The event name for which the data was collected

socialdev_pfbc_01.Description: The staff explained the study clearly | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_02.Description: The consent form informed me clearly that this is a substudy to the ABCD study in which I am already participating and that I do not need to participate in both. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_03.Description: The staff responded in a clear manner to my questions. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_04.Description: The waiting time was too long. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_05.Description: I did not understand some of the questions. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_06.Description: When I did not understand a question there was a staff member that I could ask for help. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_07.Description: I felt comfortable with the staff. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_08.Description: I felt uncomfortable with some of the questions. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_09.Description: I am ok with not knowing the responses that my child gave in this survey. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_10.Description: My confidential information was treated in a professional manner. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_11.Description: The level of compensation seemed appropriate. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_12.Description: The adding of this survey to my assessment day was too strenuous. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_13.Description: The adding of this survey to my assessment day makes me feel more negative about BOTH the studies I have participated in today. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_14.Description: The adding of this survey to my assessment day was positive. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_15.Description: I would have rather scheduled a separate visit for this survey. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_16.Description: I would rather do both studies at the same time. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_17.Description: I would participate in this type of research again. | 5= Strongly agree; 4= Agree; 3= Neither agree nor disagree (neutral); 2= Disagree; 1= Strongly disagree

socialdev_pfbc_18.Description: Please tell us about your suggestions to make the study even better.
